maqras.text: Say Kto zadovazit for ona heavens zem? Say GOD Either my ona guided ist daleko astray
Say Ona je zodpovedny for our zlocin nor je my zodpovedny for co ona robit
Say Our Lord zozbierat us all dohromady before Him potom He judge us equitably! He bol Judge Omniscient
Say Show mna idols ona set mat rad partners Him! nie Say He bol 1 GOD Almighty Wise
(My sent ona O Rashad) all ludia bearer z dobry zvest i mat rad warner vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
They challenge When this promise pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
Say Ona have specific cas specific dni ona nie zdrzat 1 hodiny nor zaloha

Those disbelieve said My nie verit v this Quran nor previous scriptures. ona len envision these transgressors when they stand ich Lord They argue 1 iny zadny i forth followers tell ich leaders If nie bol ona my bol believers
leaders say do those will nasledovat them my the jeden Je diverted ona guidance it pojdem ona? Ziaden; it bol ona bol zlomyselny

followers say do ich leaders bol ona kut plany night dni potom commanded us bol unappreciative z GOD set idols rank Him. They ridden remorse when they see retribution my miesto puta krk z those disbelieved they justly nie requited co they robit
Kazdy cas my sent warner obec leaders ze obec said My zamietnut odkaz ona sent s
They i said My bol mocny inak peniaze dieta my nie punished
Say Moj Lord bol 1 controls all provisions He grants provisions whomever He wills reduces them vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Nie bol tvoj peniaze tvoj dieta bring ona koniec do us. Len those verit lead righteous zivot receive reward ich robota multiplied manifold Do abode Raj they robit zit v zdokonalit peace
Mat rad for those consistently challenge our revelations they abide retribution
Say Moj Lord bol Jeden controls all provisions He zvacsit provisions whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants reduces them! Anything ona spend zapricinit God He reward ona it He je Lepsie Provider
Dni when He zvolat them all He say do angels these robit zaludnit kult ona
They answer Ona glorified Ona bol our Lord Zvladnut nie them! Radsej they kult jinns; vela z them bol believers therein
Dni ona nie possess power pomoc harm 1 iny my say do transgressors Chut retribution Hell ona pouzivat zapierat

When our proofs recited them perfectly zretelny they said This je len clovek chudoba divert ona way tvoj rodicia kult. They i said These fabricated laicky. Those disbelieved i said truth pojdem them This bol obviously kuzlo
My nie dat them any inaksie rezervovat si study nor robit my send do them ona iny warner
Those before them disbelieved vecer though they nie see one-tenth (zazrak) my dat this generation when they disbelieved Moj posol ako severe bol Moj retribution
